sentences.sContent: Those who an experiment studied 184 pass 60 years old is healthy but life sloven .
sentences.sContent_eng: Those who an experiment studied 184 pass 60 years old is healthy but life sloven .
sentences.sCn: 有一项实验研究了184名年过60岁的身体健康但生活懒散的人。

sentences.sContent: Theophrastus's "Characters, " written in the fourth century B. C. , paints a portrait of a hairy, scabby sloven named Nastiness, who doesn't wash his hands after dinner.
sentences.sContent_eng: Theophrastus's "Characters, " written in the fourth century B. C. , paints a portrait of a hairy, scabby sloven named Nastiness, who doesn't wash his hands after dinner.
sentences.sCn: 泰奥弗拉斯托斯在公元前十四世纪所著《品格论》中，描述了一个浑身毛茸茸的长满疥癣的懒散人，名叫污秽，此人饭后从不洗手。

synos.tran: 懒散的人；不修边幅的人

words.tran: 懒散的；不整洁的；马虎的
邋遢地；马虎地；不整洁地

trans.tranCn: 懒散的人, 散漫的人
